TopicTitle: It's funny really, how ksp turned into kfp/khp/kcp/krp/kbp/kaotap

Articles.Content:
The game got designed as a space program, and right now we\'ve got come to the point where there are plane mods, helicopter mods, car mods, robot mods, blimp mods, and combinations of all those.

I mean, harvester must have lolled his head off when the users themselves came up with all these awesome addons for his space game.

I don\'t think he could have ever imagined how big this game would become, already at this stage of development.

It\'s amazing to think about, truly.

I think the easy customisation of this game is a good selling point for it really

My interest may have waned a little if it wasn\'t for all the extra mods/plug ins etc

And don\'t forget the submarine mods!

Truely the skies **not** the limit for this little ol\' game!
Still waiting on a spelunking vehicle, every good planet has caves ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

But all of the modes of transport you have mentioned are vital for space exploration.

Most people think that a space program\'s job is simply to build rockets. It is not. It is about designing ways to travel and explore other planets. Space itself is quite boring... ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
